order

Class OrderRecordController

  • java.lang.Object
    • order.OrderRecordController

  • public class OrderRecordController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is for creating order titled pane details in MyOrdersController sets an approve button only for orders that been accepted by supplier and not been recieved by customer
    Since:
    01.01.2022
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matan Weisberg

        public void setData(Order order,
                    MyListener approveOrder,
                    javafx.scene.control.TitledPane pane,
                    MyListener changeAccordion)
        This func initializes our controller saves all the info for order and set it up
        Parameters:
        order - the current order
        approveOrder - the listener that will be used to approve order in MyOrdersController
        changeAccordion - the listener that will be used to change accordion in MyOrdersController
        pane - the pane that contains current order deatails
